configuration.SAS.session.host: Full URL of your viya server
configuration.SAS.session.user: User name for authentication with password flow
configuration.SAS.session.clientId: Client ID for authentication with password flow. Get from your admin.
configuration.SAS.session.clientSecret: Client secret for authentication with password flow. Get from your admin.
configuration.SAS.session.tokenFile: Full path to a token file for authentication. Otherwise take password flow.
